common: Ask a doctor or pharmacist if Visine Advanced Relief is safe to use if you have ever had
Use caution in hypertension, coronary artery disease, diabetes, and hyperthyroidism
Discontinue and seek medical advice if the following occur: eye pain, changes in vision, redness or irritation of the eye lasts >72 hr
Wash hands before using eye medication
To be used exactly as directed on label, or as prescribed by the doctor
Not for use while wearing soft contact lenses; a preservative in this medication could permanently stain lenses; use medicine at least 15 minutes before inserting contact lenses
Use only the number of drops recommended on label
Do not touch tip of eye dropper or place it directly on eye; a contaminated dropper can infect the eye, which could lead to serious vision problems
Do not use if medication has changed colors or looks cloudy
